organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: " There is tension at every step of the way , " since a battle line between the West and developing countries has been drawn over the issue of linking trade liberalisation with labour rights , he said .

Let's think step by step.

| Organization |
| --- |
| the West |
| developing countries |

Note: I've assumed that "the West" refers to a group of countries with similar political, economic, and social systems, often including North America and Europe.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Organization" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Organization |
| --- |
| developing countries |

I have removed "the West" as it can be interpreted in various ways, such as a geographical region, a cultural concept, or a collection of countries. However, in the context of this paragraph, it seems to refer to a group of countries, which can be seen as an organization. Nonetheless, to avoid ambiguity, I have only listed "developing countries" as a clear Organization entity.
